legends.planet: That was casual planet without some magic. But in one battle on this planet droped magic stone what changed all

battleground.title: Battleground
battleground.text: My game has (not now :D) different battlefields: forests and others.

markup.title: Markup
markup.text: The movements and attacks that occur are partitioned into regions of cells with y, x, and z coordinates

battleground-staff.title: More about battle
battleground-staff.text: A battle can happen between more than two people. We have trees, rocks, etc.

stage-display.title: Battle stages
stage-display.text: I don't want to answer that question right now (because I haven't thought about it).
